about_the_game:
The Seers Isle Original Soundtrack features more than 90 minutes of music created exclusively for the game.

MP3-format files will be placed in your Seers Isle folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Seerisle\Soundtrack

Total Runtime: 1:37:39

Personnel (in alphabetical order):


Gabriel Bille — Cello,
Christelle Canot — Vocals,
Aldebaran Garrido — Viola,
Camille Marcos — Flute, Bass Clarinet,
Julien Ponsoda — Trombone, Guitarlele,
Claire Sciacco — Violin,
Geoffroy Vincens — Bouzouki.


The Seers Isle Original Soundtrack was composed and arranged by Camille Marcos and Julien Ponsada (Illustrason), except "Seers Isle (Title Song)", that was written and composed by Christelle Canot.

The album was recorded, mixed, and mastered by Illustrason in Bordeaux in 2018, and published by Nova-box.
